page.title: 07SCHOOL DAYS IN DENHOLME
page.content:
{ Denholme First School}is a semi-open plan building, completed in l975. There are 169 children aged 3-9 years, arranged in five classes and a nursery. The kitchen provides school meals and 'meals on wheels'. { {Keelham First School} has 70 pupils, aged 5-9 years, arranged in 3 classes. Most pupils live some distancee away.
{A child's day by Melissa At 9 o'clock we did spelling. Then we did maths and reading. In assembly I played the recorder. We had l5 minutes playtime and I did handstands. Then we wrote a diary. After school dinner it was playtime again. We practised italic handwriting and I drew a pattern. After a story I went home at 3 o'clock.
